attributes.action: Write into Law help for all people with Cancer to include that all cancer sufferers get some form of Disability Living Allowance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Cancer is a Disabilty, what ever form you have if you have to have Chemotheraphy/Radiotheraphy you should get some financial help in the form of Disability Living Allowance that is not means tested.
